member.name: IAppxPackageWriter2.Close
member.summary: Closes the package writer object's output stream.
member.param: The stream that provides the contents of the manifest for the package. The stream must support , , and .
The stream that provides the contents of the content group map for the package.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The input stream contains a manifest that is not valid.

member.name: IAppxPackageWriter2
member.summary: Provides a write-only object model for app packages.
